title: Are Tokai guitars made in Japan today good quality? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tokai guitars made in Japan are very good but not all Tokai guitars are now made in Japan. Tokia have and still do make copies of American guitars that infringe on trademarks, so are illegal in the US. and can be confiscated. Another thing to keep in mind is that the guitars they make outside of Japan often use alternative tonewoods that are not as desirable. They look the same so do not assume they are.

Yes. For a simple rule of thumb, guitars made in their home country are good, e.g. Ibanez made in Japan, Fender in Corona/California, etc. Tokai, in my opinion, are not the best. It also depends on the model you get
